Title: The Story of Thugnificent
Plot: The infamous rapper Thugnificent moves to the neighbourhood with his friends Macktastic and Flonominal, eventually leading to Granddad becoming annoyed with his new neighbours. Their feud inspires Thugnificent to create a diss-track called "Eff Granddad".
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
